page.title: 13Ackie
page.content: Ackie is a game for any amount of people. First one person is on and they have to count up to an agreed number say 100.By the time they have reach the number the other people playing should have hidden themselves. Then the hunt ison , when the person hiding is seen then the race is on , who can get to thestarting post first to say Ackie 123 if the person counting gets there first and adds the other persons name then the person who lost the race to the starting post is out and will have to do the counting next time , the game continues until everyone is back at the starting post.
